## SolidLineTechniqueParams interface

Declares a a geometry as a solid line.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SolidLineTechniqueParams extends BaseTechniqueParams, PolygonalTechniqueParams 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [caps](./harp-datasource-protocol.solidlinetechniqueparams.caps.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;[LineCaps](./harp-datasource-protocol.linecaps.md)<!-- -->&gt; | Describes line caps type (<code>&quot;None&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;Round&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;Square&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;TriangleOut&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;TriangleIn&quot;</code>). Default is <code>&quot;Round&quot;</code>. |
|  [clipping](./harp-datasource-protocol.solidlinetechniqueparams.clipping.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;boolean&gt; | Clip the line outside the tile if <code>true</code>. |
|  [color](./harp-datasource-protocol.solidlinetechniqueparams.color.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;[StyleColor](./harp-datasource-protocol.stylecolor.md)<!-- -->&gt; | Color of a line in hexadecimal or CSS-style notation, for example: <code>&quot;#e4e9ec&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;#fff&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;rgb(255, 0, 0)&quot;</code>, or <code>&quot;hsl(35, 11%, 88%)&quot;</code>.  color-hex |
|  [dashColor](./harp-datasource-protocol.solidlinetechniqueparams.dashcolor.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;[StyleColor](./harp-datasource-protocol.stylecolor.md)<!-- -->&gt; | Color of a line dashes in hexadecimal or CSS-style notation, for example: <code>&quot;#e4e9ec&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;#fff&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;rgb(255, 0, 0)&quot;</code>, or <code>&quot;hsl(35, 11%, 88%)&quot;</code>.  color-hex |
|  [dashes](./harp-datasource-protocol.solidlinetechniqueparams.dashes.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;[LineDashes](./harp-datasource-protocol.linedashes.md)<!-- -->&gt; | Describes line dash type (<code>&quot;Round&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;Square&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;Diamond&quot;</code>). Default is <code>&quot;Square&quot;</code>. |
|  [dashSize](./harp-datasource-protocol.solidlinetechniqueparams.dashsize.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;[StyleLength](./harp-datasource-protocol.stylelength.md)<!-- -->&gt; | Length of a line in meters for different zoom levels. |
|  [drawRangeEnd](./harp-datasource-protocol.solidlinetechniqueparams.drawrangeend.md) | number | Describes the ending drawing position for the line (in the range \[0...1\]). Default is <code>1.0</code>. |
|  [drawRangeStart](./harp-datasource-protocol.solidlinetechniqueparams.drawrangestart.md) | number | Describes the starting drawing position for the line (in the range \[0...1\]). Default is <code>0.0</code>. |
|  [gapSize](./harp-datasource-protocol.solidlinetechniqueparams.gapsize.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;[StyleLength](./harp-datasource-protocol.stylelength.md)<!-- -->&gt; | Size of a gap between lines in meters for different zoom levels. |
|  [lineWidth](./harp-datasource-protocol.solidlinetechniqueparams.linewidth.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;[StyleLength](./harp-datasource-protocol.stylelength.md)<!-- -->&gt; | Width of a line in <code>metricUnit</code> for different zoom levels. |
|  [metricUnit](./harp-datasource-protocol.solidlinetechniqueparams.metricunit.md) | string |  |
|  [offset](./harp-datasource-protocol.solidlinetechniqueparams.offset.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | Size in world units how far to offset the line perpendicular to its direction. |
|  [opacity](./harp-datasource-protocol.solidlinetechniqueparams.opacity.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | For transparent lines, set a value between <code>0.0</code> for fully transparent, to <code>1.0</code> for fully opaque. |
|  [outlineColor](./harp-datasource-protocol.solidlinetechniqueparams.outlinecolor.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;[StyleColor](./harp-datasource-protocol.stylecolor.md)<!-- -->&gt; | Color of a line outline in hexadecimal or CSS-style notation, for example: <code>&quot;#e4e9ec&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;#fff&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;rgb(255, 0, 0)&quot;</code>, or <code>&quot;hsl(35, 11%, 88%)&quot;</code>.  color-hex |
|  [outlineWidth](./harp-datasource-protocol.solidlinetechniqueparams.outlinewidth.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;[StyleLength](./harp-datasource-protocol.stylelength.md)<!-- -->&gt; | Outline width of a line in <code>metricUnit</code>s for different zoom levels. |
|  [secondaryCaps](./harp-datasource-protocol.solidlinetechniqueparams.secondarycaps.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;[LineCaps](./harp-datasource-protocol.linecaps.md)<!-- -->&gt; | Describes secondary line caps type (<code>&quot;None&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;Round&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;Square&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;TriangleOut&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;TriangleIn&quot;</code>). Default is <code>&quot;Round&quot;</code>. |
|  [secondaryCategory](./harp-datasource-protocol.solidlinetechniqueparams.secondarycategory.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;string&gt; | Describes the category of the secondary geometry object created using this technique. |
|  [secondaryColor](./harp-datasource-protocol.solidlinetechniqueparams.secondarycolor.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;[StyleColor](./harp-datasource-protocol.stylecolor.md)<!-- -->&gt; | Color of secondary line geometry in hexadecimal or CSS-style notation, for example: <code>&quot;#e4e9ec&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;#fff&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;rgb(255, 0, 0)&quot;</code>, or <code>&quot;hsl(35, 11%, 88%)&quot;</code>.  color-hex |
|  [secondaryRenderOrder](./harp-datasource-protocol.solidlinetechniqueparams.secondaryrenderorder.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | The render order of the secondary line geometry object created using this technique. |
|  [secondaryWidth](./harp-datasource-protocol.solidlinetechniqueparams.secondarywidth.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;[StyleLength](./harp-datasource-protocol.stylelength.md)<!-- -->&gt; | Width of secondary line geometry in <code>metricUnit</code>s for different zoom levels. |
|  [transparent](./harp-datasource-protocol.solidlinetechniqueparams.transparent.md) | boolean | Set to <code>true</code> if line should appear transparent. Rendering transparent lines may come with a slight performance impact. |
